import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import axios from 'axios'; function ConsumerService(props){ const [name, setName] = useState(); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(); const [amount, setAmount] = useState(); const [price, setPrice] = useState(); const userName = props.name; const userType = props.type; const handleClick = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); if(!name || !phone || !amount || !price){ toast.error("All Feilds are manadatory!") } else{ axios.post("http://localhost:3001/user/services", {name, phone, amount, price}) .then(result =>{ console.log(result) }) } } return(

E-WASTE COLLECTION

Safely dispose of your electronic waste by availing our doorstep collection
service. Our team ensures secure handling and eco-friendly disposal of your
outdated or unused electronics.

QUICK AND EASY SELLING

Sell your e-waste effortlessly! Our streamlined process allows consumers to sell
their electronics hassle-free. From old gadgets to unused appliances, turn your
e-waste into a valuable resource.

COMPETITIVE PRICING

Receive fair and competitive prices for your e-waste. We believe in transparent
transactions, ensuring that consumers get the best value for their electronics
while contributing to a sustainable environment.

ENVIRONMENTALLY RESPONSIBLE DISPOSAL.

Choose a greener path for your e-waste. We adhere to environmentally responsible
disposal practices, ensuring that hazardous materials are properly managed, and
valuable components are recycled.

SELL YOUR WASTE

setName(e.target.value)} className='form-control form-control-lg my-3' placeholder='Name' type='text' /> setPhone(e.target.value)} className='form-control form-control-lg my-3' placeholder='Phone Number' type='text' /> setAmount(e.target.value)} className='form-control form-control-lg my-3' placeholder="Amount of Waste (in KG's)" type='text' /> setPrice(e.target.value)} className='form-control form-control-lg my-3' placeholder='Price(per KG)' type='text' /> Submit
); } export default ConsumerService;
